name: Shark Attack Boat Runner
description:
The most exotic fish in the sea are in danger! Only you can save them from certain peril by purchasing them with valuable gems. There's just one catch. You have to navigate treacherous islands at high speed while avoiding hungry sharks to collect the gems.

Features:

- Optimized for iPhone 6 and above!
- Extremely Fast paced top down scrolling game
- in App Purchase for fast acquisition of gems
- Game Center integration
- Living aquarium
- Statistics Page
- Cool Sound Track and Sound Effects
- Keep up to 30 exotic fish at a time

Tip: Once at max speed, points quadruple! Stay alive at max speed to attain highest score.
